name: layout
label: Layout
description: The basic layout design of the cart.

name: body-bg
label: Page Background Color
description: The background color of the page. Note that text is not placed directly on this color; all text is included within the main content area, which has its own color definition.

name: company-name-color
label: Company Name Text Color
description: The color of the company name in the header. Note that if you upload a company logo, then the company name text is not displayed.

name: logo
label: Company Logo
description: The main company logo. We recommend an image with a transparent background or one that blends well with the header background color.

name: favicon
label: Favicon
description: The page favicon image. Providing a square image is highly recommended; images that are not square will automatically be cropped square. For maximum compatibility, the image you provide should be no larger than 196 x 196 pixels.

name: header-size
label: Header Size
description: The size of the header.

name: header-bg
label: Header Background Color
description: The background color for the header.

name: header-divider-bar-color
label: Header Divider Bar Color
description: The color of the divider bar the separates the header and main page sections.

name: header-brand-align
label: Header Logo / Company Name Alignment
description: How the logo or company name should be aligned in the header.

name: web_font_import
label: Web Font Import
description: If you would like to use external web fonts (such as Google Web Fonts) in your application, provide the URL for the font or fonts here. If you are using Google Web Fonts, go to the Google Web Fonts site, select and customize the font or fonts you want to use, and paste the font URL here. The font URL can be found within the 'href' value of the font link HTML provided by Google Web Fonts. You can then use these fonts in your font definitions.

name: font-family-company-name
label: Company Name Font
description: The font or fonts used in the company name in the main page navigation / header. Note that if you upload a company logo, then the company name text is not displayed.

name: font-family-base
label: Main Font
description: The primary font or fonts used throughout the app.

name: font-family-footer
label: Footer Font
description: The font used in the page footer.

name: main-content-bg
label: Main Content Background Color
description: The background color of the main content area. Text will be placed in this section and therefore this color should have sharp contrast to the main text color.

name: main-content-shaded-bg
label: Main Content Shaded Background Color
description: The background color of the credit card form in the main content area. Text will be placed in this section and therefore this color should have sharp contrast to the main text color.

name: main-content-color
label: Main Content Text Color
description: The main text color of the main content area. Should have a sharp contrast to the Main Content Background Color.

name: panel-border-radius
label: Panel Border Radius
description: Allows you to set a curve to the border of panels.

name: panel-border-color
label: Panel Border Color
description: The border color for panels. Set to the Main Content Background Color if you don't want a panel border.

name: link-color
label: Main Content Link Color
description: The main link color of the main content area.

name: h-color
label: Section Text Header Color
description: The color for header text within the main content area. Will be placed directly on the main content background color.

name: footer-bg
label: Footer Background Color
description: The background color for the page footer.

name: footer-color
label: Footer Text Color
description: The text color for the page footer. Should have sharp contrast to the Footer Background Color.

name: footer-link-color
label: Footer Link Color
description: The link color for the page footer.

name: footer-size
label: Footer Size
description: The size of the page footer.

options.display: Remove / Hide (don't display the default footer)

name: state-success-bg
label: Success Alert Background Color
description: The background color for notifications and alerts that indicate success. Generally a light green is used.

name: state-success-text
label: Success Alert Text Color
description: The text color for notifications and alerts that indicate success. Generally a dark green is used that is clearly legible on the Success Alert Background Color.

name: state-info-bg
label: Info Alert Background Color
description: The background color for notifications and alerts that indicate general information. Generally a light blue is used.

name: state-info-text
label: Info Alert Text Color
description: The text color for notifications and alerts that indicate general information. Generally a dark blue is used that is clearly legible on the Info Alert Background Color.

name: state-danger-bg
label: Error Alert Background Color
description: The background color for notifications and alerts that indicate an error. Generally a light red is used.

name: state-danger-text
label: Error Alert Text Color
description: The text color for notifications and alerts that indicate an error. Generally a dark red is used that is clearly legible on the Error Alert Background Color.

name: brand-primary
label: Primary Color
description: 'Primary' color, used for 'call to action' text and buttons. Generally your brand color is used.

name: brand-success
label: Success Color
description: 'Success' color, used for 'call to action' text and buttons. Generally a green color is used.

name: brand-info
label: Info Color
description: 'Info' color, used for secondary 'call to action' text and buttons. Generally a blue color is used, or another color that harmonizes well with your design.

name: brand-danger
label: Danger Color
description: 'Danger' color, used for text that indicates an error or buttons that indicate a removal action. Generally a red color is used.

name: btn-primary-color
label: Primary Button Text Color
description: 'Primary' button text color. Should be a strong contrast to your Primary Brand Color.

name: btn-success-color
label: Success Button Text Color
description: 'Success' button text color. Should be a strong contrast to your Success Color.

name: btn-info-color
label: Info Button Text Color
description: 'Info' button text color. Should be a strong contrast to your Info Color.

name: btn-warning-color
label: Warning Button Text Color
description: 'Warning' button text color. Should be a strong contrast to your Warning Color.

name: btn-default-bg
label: Default Button Background Color
description: The background color for default buttons. Generally used for buttons that do not require strong attention.

name: btn-default-color
label: Default Button Text Color
description: The text color for default buttons. Should have sharp contrast to the Default Button Background Color.

name: product-icon-border-color
label: Product Icon Border Color
description: The border color for product icons / images. Set to the Main Content Background Color if you don't want a product icon border.

name: input-border-radius
label: Input Border Radius
description: Allows you to set a curve to the border of form input elements.

name: input-bg
label: Input Background Color
description: The background color for form inputs.

name: input-color
label: Input Text Color
description: The text color for form inputs.

name: placeholder-color
label: Input Placeholder Text Color
description: The text color for 'placeholder' text form inputs (used for prompts and icons within inputs, generally is lighter than the input text color).

name: stepper-bg
label: Quantity Stepper Background Color
description: The background color for quantity stepper buttons. Generally matches the background color of form inputs.

name: stepper-color
label: Quantity Stepper Icon Color
description: The icon color for quantity stepper buttons. Generally matches the link color of main content.

name: header_html
label: Custom Header HTML
description: Supply a section of HTML to be used as your global header. If you supply custom HTML, you may want to remove / hide the default navbar under the app's style settings (choose 'Remove' under Navbar Size).

name: footer_html
label: Custom Footer HTML
description: Supply a section of HTML to be used as your global footer. If you supply custom HTML, you may want to remove / hide the default footer under the app's style settings (choose 'Remove' under Footer Size).

name: main-shadows
label: Use Shadows
description: Indicates if the main navigation bar and the main content area should have a shadow applied. The shadows are subtle. Disable to maintain a flat look.

name: loading-bar-bg-color
label: Loading Bar Color
description: The color or the small loading bar at the top of the page that indicates progress when background requests are processing. Should be a in contrast to your navbar color.
